author: 200percentmicky
description: A fully functioning clock for your Discord server.
install_msg: âœ… **Thanks for installing Chronos Delta to your bot.** Run `[p]time` to show your server's current time. Use `[p]settimezone server` to set a time zone.
short: A fully functioning clock for your Discord server.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs and guild IDs if they want to set a time zone for themselves or for the server. The user can remove stored information by simply running '[p]settimezone user' or for the server '[p]settimezone server' as is.
